divs: Sighting Detailsgoing to work on Paletown Rd in Richland Town PA. Noticed brite orbs hovering in the sky in a dark field to my right. Had a staircase pattern to them - sitting in the sky - pattern like they were on a staircase. No noise, no movement at all. White roundish colored orbs with a redish, orange, outline around the orbs. Had to go to work could not stop to investigate. But it is an area I know very well. I drive down this road every night and I never saw anything like this. Had a car driving behind me as I was looking at these objects - could not stop my car - had a tailgatter behind me. If I were not going to work and did not get points for being late or absent I would have pulled over and gotten a much better view of these things. I had a previous sighting back in 1977. A saucer was sitting over my house in Doylestown pa. I have already reported the story many years ago so I won't go into it again. I am surprised to witness another ufo event but after you see what I have seen close up. I already know that ufo's are real and coming here for an unknown reason. Probably just investigating like we do on unknown planets.
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around July 30th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: brite orbs hovering in a staircase pattern up into the sky
